name: Laser Squad 3D - The Assassins
description:
Take control of a member of the Laser Squad, who has been tasked with finding and killing intergalactic criminal Sterner Regnix, who is hiding on a distant planet with his army of robots.

This is an arcade recreation of the mission The Assassins from Laser Squad originally for the ZX Spectrum, created by Julian Gollop and published by Target Games.  THis game is Win/Linux/Mac.

  • See the readme for instructions, though it should be pretty self-explanatory.
  • Currently only the first two levels are implemented.
  • Regarding the Linux and Mac releases, I have neither of these systems so I can't check if they work.  However, as of writing this, no-one has told me otherwise yet.
  • If you have any problems or find any bugs, please let me know.  Also, any messages of encouragement are much appreciated!

If this game proves popular, I might have a go at recreating Moonbase Assault!
